ValidationRule.description: Sales Representatives must populate the Onsite or Virtual field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Job_Name__c = "Sales Representative", ISPICKVAL(Onsite_or_Virtual__c, ""), OR( ISNULL(TimeTrade_SF1__Invitation__c) ,ISNULL( TimeTrade_SF1__Meeting__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The 'Onsite or Virtual' field on the Event record must be populated.
